title: 1v1.LOL
description: 1v1.LOL is a building battle royale game where you compete against other players.
instructions: Use WASD to move, left click to shoot, Q to build walls.

title: Drive Mad
description: Drive Mad is an exciting car game where you navigate challenging tracks.
instructions: Use arrow keys to drive and balance the car.

title: World's Hardest Game
description: Challenge yourself in the World's Hardest Game, a brutally difficult puzzle game.
instructions: Use arrow keys to move your red square. Avoid blue dots and reach the goal.
